readable.title: 3009018821_ba47396e24
readable.content: A girl in a swimming pool playing badminton while a lady watches . A woman in a pink bathing suit holds a badminton racket while another lady looks on . A woman sits and watches another woman play in the pool . One woman sitting beside the pool while another plays badminton in the pool . Woman playing badminton in the pool while another woman looks on .
